# Unshakable Foundation
## Scripture
"Everyone then who hears these words of mine and does them will be like a wise man who built his house on the rock. And the rain fell, and the floods came, and the winds blew and beat on that house, but it did not fall, because it had been founded on the rock." â€“ Matthew 7:24-25 (NIV)
## Reflection
As we face the challenges of life, we often feel like our footing is being tested. The world around us can be unpredictable and turbulent, threatening to upend our sense of balance and security. But as men of faith, we have a secret to anchoring ourselves in the midst of chaos. It's not about having the strongest will or the most robust plans; it's about building our lives on the unshakeable foundation of God's Word. When we prioritize scripture and obedience to Jesus, we can rest in the assurance that our lives are anchored on something greater than ourselves. In the face of life's storms, we can stand firm, unshaken and unafraid.

## Daily Challenge
Spend 10 minutes in prayer, asking God to reveal areas in your life where you need to anchor yourself more firmly on His Word. Then, take a physical stance of strength by holding a plank position for 30 seconds while declaring, "I stand unshakable on the rock of God's truth."
